0: :root {    /* DARK THEME COLORS */    --whoogle-dark-logo: #cdd6f4;    --whoogle-dark-page-bg: #1e1e2e;    --whoogle-dark-element-bg: #45475a;    --whoogle-dark-text: #cdd6f4;    --whoogle-dark-contrast-text: #bac2de;    --whoogle-dark-secondary-text: #a6adc8;    --whoogle-dark-result-bg: #313244;    --whoogle-dark-result-title: #b4befe;    --whoogle-dark-result-url: #f5e0dc;    --whoogle-dark-result-visited: #eba0ac;}#whoogle-w {    fill: #89b4fa;}#whoogle-h {    fill: #f38ba8;}#whoogle-o-1 {    fill: #f9e2af;}#whoogle-o-2 {    fill: #89b4fa;}#whoogle-g {    fill: #a6e3a1;}#whoogle-l {    fill: #f38ba8;}#whoogle-e {    fill: #f9e2af;}

1:
acl url_discovery path /.well-known/caldav /.well-known/carddav
http-request redirect location /remote.php/dav/ code 301 if url_discovery
option http-keep-alive
timeout server 120000ms
